timeline.message: Wait for pipeline to get fully positioned before opening node properties

timeline.bodyText: Is 500ms enough? What happens on a large pipeline? Is rearranging the nodes a constant time?
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

replies.bodyText: I suspect rearranging the nodes is not constant time, and that it would take longer for larger pipelines with more nodes and connections.
replies.author: yukiej
